EmailTemplate.subject: An exclusive first look at yesterday’s webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We know you waited quite a while yesterday for our webinar to start. The wait is over! Your time is valuable, so we’d like to invite you to have a first look <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey> at the replay of the session before anyone else.
Check out the replay <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey> and slides <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey-54828545> of Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey, where Coté reviewed the top goals and strategies that can help companies and teams deploy greenfield projects:
- Earn trust by showing success - Establish a continuous delivery pipeline and cloud platform - Learn by doing and educate the rest of the organization
We’d also like to offer you a hard copy of Matt’s Stine’s Migrating to Cloud Native Application Architectures O’Reilly Book. Email us <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> and tell us where to send it!
Thanks again for your interest in our series and we hope you can join Coté and team for Part 2 <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-working-with-legacy-it> & Part 3 <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation> coming in December.
The Pivotal Team
